name: Cybernetic Eye, Image Intensifier (TL-14)
description:
The intensifier cybernetic eye magnifies, sharpens focus and contract to improve visual recognition. Image intensification also includes light-amplification capabilities. This version of the cybernetic eye has a single-function and is easily recognizable as a mechanical implant.

In all cases, the cyber eye also includes basic visible light vision. For Sophonts with different visual ranges the basic cyber eye will cover their normal visual range.
